content: lion brand pattern # 50121 corrections applied skill level easy level 2 size one size width 16 \ 40 5 cm at neck edge 53 \ 134 5 cm at lower edge length 15½ \ 39 5 cm a lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* 122 yards for collar and trim plus moonlight mohair article #510 b 2 balls 510-204 rainbow falls c 2 balls 510-206 purple mountains d 3 balls 510-203 safari e 3 balls 510-201 rain forest crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 12 single_crochet + 12 row = 4 \ 10 cm with a 12 double_crochet + 6 row = 4 \ 10 cm with b special stitch 2-double_crochet shell cape is worked from the neck down in one piece working in random stripes of moonlight mohair change color as desired *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology *
